entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 5:29AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Another 4 Inches of Snow In The Brooks Range Through Saturday... Snow is expected to continue in the Brooks Range through Saturday. Another 4 inches of snow accumulation is possible through Saturday, with the heaviest amounts in the Brooks Range.
